data.title: Dharma & Greg Episode List
data.meta_description: Dharma & Greg episode list - Read online for free. This document provides a summary of the first 14 episodes of the TV show "Dharma and Greg" including the episode titles, directors, writers, and air dates. The summaries highlight some of the key plot points in each episode such as Dharma and Greg getting married after just meeting, tensions between their hippie and socialite families, Greg considering a career in politics, revelations about Dharma and Greg's fathers' pasts, and Greg pursuing a new career as a short-order cook which prompts his father to share his secret talent of hairdressing. The episodes cover the couple navigating their relationship and tensions between their different families and backgrounds.
